Mind over Body (1213) vs. Focus Barrier (1216)

4
Gompers
Thursday, August 17th, 2017, 11:29:58 PM

Which is your favorite? Discuss here.

Lochiven
Friday, August 18th, 2017, 6:13:12 AM

I chose 1213 over 1216. I run surge+burst with 100% uptime and 1213 allowed me to do that. I lost 30 DS from 1216 but gained 12 agility bonus (9-12 DS stance dependant), 5 dex bonus, and 12 strength bonus. So more carrying capacity and that's a lot of agidex to get to next rt threshold.

Also depends if you have a hunting partner and if they benefit from either.

Flimbo
Friday, August 18th, 2017, 1:22:05 PM

You cray, @Lochiven . Stamina is for mstriking, not surge and burst!

In a solo hunt, if I can lie down in offensive and not get hit I turn 1213 on, otherwise 1216 just for peace of mind and ease.

In a group, if anyone else uses stamina or if I have any outside spells, it's 1213.

Both get use though.
